greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 6: repeat [0, 0, 0, 1, 2, 2].
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x^3*(1 + 2 x + 2 x^2)/(1 - x^6), {x, 0, 102}], x] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 25 2018 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(v=[0, 0, 1, 2, 2]); v[if(n%6==0, 1, n%6)] \\ _Felix Fröhlich_, Feb 24 2018
(PARI) concat(vector(3), Vec(x^3*(1 + 2*x + 2*x^2)/(1 - x^6) + O(x^40))) \\ _Felix Fröhlich_, Feb 25 2018
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Feb 24 2018
